attributes.action: ensure that compensation paid to soldiers, sailors and airmen injured on active service anywhere on the planet receive the same amount of compensation as those who are injured when drugs trials they volunteer (and get paid) to take part in go wrong.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does anybody REALLY need to have it explained to them?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
